name: With Artillery, War is Made
description:
The year: Unknown | The war: Ferocious | The artillery: GLORIOUS

Command your state of the art artillery battery in a war against a tyrannical enemy.

This game was made between the 3rd and 11th of January 2022 for the "Juice Jam" game jam

Art, Design, and Programming

Benjamin McDonald

Thomas McDonald

Voice Acting
